## Tender Description

This tender covers the purchase of office furniture, for delivery and installation between April 19, 2024, and November 30, 2024, to Gatineau, Quebec (Hull). Security requirements apply to this procurement. Respondents are expected to adhere to strict security guidelines to ensure successful project execution. The contract award will be based on the lowest price submitted by the respondents.

The tender reference number is WS4348966672-Doc4349080682 and the solicitation number is WS4348966672. Bidders must respond to this tender to be considered for contract award. Please refer to the notice URL for more information. The contact
